roleset.name: allowing an old exception to a new regulation

example.name: just arg0
example.text: LeeAnn , Do you know whether the Brantford bylaw incorporated in their grandfathering the inclusion of a mandatory muzzling ?

example.name: Both args
example.text: We guarantee their security , in exchange for their grandfathering the civil rights of all American citizens resident there at the time of political seperation .

propbank.arg: the civil rights of all American citizens resident there at the time of political seperation

roleset.note: GRANDFATHERING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from grandfathering.01-n)
